mapper.insert: insert into board values(seq_board.nextval, #{id}, #{name}, #{email}, #{subject}, #{content}, seq_board.currval, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from board order by ref desc, step asc) tt) where rn >= #{startNum} and rn <= #{endNum}
mapper.update: update board set hit = hit + 1 where seq = #{seq}
update board set subject = #{subject}, content = #{content}, logtime = sysdate where seq = #{seq}
update board set step = step +1 where ref = #{ref} and step > #{step}
update board set reply = reply +1 where seq = #{seq}
